title: Does a widow have to share the pension of her late husband? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Sadia says does that we do have to share the pension of her late husband if this is provided by the government as in the Provident Fund etc then no she does not share it because this is given from the government to the wife but if it is end-of-service indemnity or bonuses or the likes this is to be shared with the heirs as part of the inheritance
